JAPN 101 (3): Beginning Japanese I (Term 2). Pre-requisite: JAPN 100 or equivalent.
If you have taken or plan to take the intensive course equivalents, you will receive credit for only one of the intensive or non-intensive courses, although the final grade for both courses will be factored into your overall GPA. For further clarification, please contact the Department of Asian Studies.

This waitlist is for JAPN 101 99C DE.

This course is prerequisite for Japanese 102. It is recommended that students who took Japanese language courses in high school must speak with your instructor.
This section of the course is ONLINE- distance education. Your instructor and course support staff will contact you by email prior to and during the course. Please ensure you have a valid email account. You will need your Campus Wide Login (CWL) to login to your course at https://www.elearning.ubc.ca/ . Course materials must be ordered or picked up at the UBC Bookstore. More information can be found under Distance Learning at : http://ctlt.ubc.ca/
Where applicable, please visit this site for examination information: http://www.students.ubc.ca/coursesreg/exams/
description: Continuation of JAPN 100 (Non-intensive). Not available for credit to students with JAPN 12. Credit will be granted for only one of JAPN 101 or JAPN 160.
